resources.string: Quiz App
What is a warning sign that you are driving on ice?
What does the Highway Code say you should carry in case you break down?

The rear of your car skids to the right - what should you do?
You are travelling at 60mph. What is the stopping distance?
When driving in fog, you should use fog lights only, high beams or low beams
The steering feels very heavy
You start imagining you are hearing Ravel's Bolero
The tyres make hardly any noise
A spade, warm clothing, a warm drink and emergency food
A Gameboy with some games you are not yet sick of, and a collection of local curry and pizza takeaway menus from places which deliver
Jump leads, blankets and a mobile phone to contact breakdown services
60mph
70mph
80mph
Kiss your ass goodbye
Steer quickly and smoothly to the left
Steer quickly and smoothly to the right
96 metres (315ft)
The way I brake, sunshine, it's about a metre
73 metres (240ft)
fog lights only
high beams
low beams
